post.author: BNA!
post.body:
You need model meshes to get started?
Here are some very good resource pages - most of them also offer loads of tutorials and links pointing to even more resources:

http://www.planetquake.com/polycount/
http://www.help3d.com/3D_Models/3d_models.html
http://www.3dsite.com/n/sites/3dsite/cg ... index.html
http://www.3dlinks.com/
http://www.burninghamstudios.com/
http://www.3dvim.com/
http://www.mr-cad.com/default.php
http://www.createandshare.com/
http://www.meshfactory.com/index2.htm
http://www.3dtotal.com/

post.author: irishlostboy1980
post.body: http://www.3dcafe.com has a load of free stuff.

post.author: Marineofuac
post.body:
http://www.turbosquid.com

best i seen.
lots of free models,
lots of $ models

post.author: zenarion
post.body:
Just a suggestion, remove the post if it is misplaced:

Host a library of compiled 3d meshes, monsters, props and textures here at doom3world.org, or at some other sites. Resources for modders.
